Changes.Change: Bug Fix; Insert and Web Search buttons wrongly enabled when structure is selected
Bug Fix; Ensure Add-in is dumb when word is embedded in another document
Bug Fix; Null pointer exception in loading of user options
Please download Chem4Word-Setup.exe via https://www.chem4word.co.uk/download/ if you encounter any difficulties updating.
Bug Fix; Null pointer exception in new O365 detection due to unexpected data
Bug Fix; Stop Right Click Convert to chemistry ignoring first character of selection
Improve Office 365 detection
Improve start up performance
Bug Fix; Series does not contain a matching element in OoXml rendering [https://github.com/Chem4Word/Version3/issues/15]
Bug Fix; Sequence contains no elements in CustomRibbon Edit [https://github.com/Chem4Word/Version3/issues/9]
Bug Fix; System.NullReferenceException in Editor.ChemDoodleWeb800 [https://github.com/Chem4Word/Version3/issues/13]
Bug Fix; HandleRightClick(); The requested member of the collection does not exist. [https://github.com/Chem4Word/Version3/issues/10]
Fix bounding box for subscript characters
Fix bug in CDW702 editor always setting bond length to 20
Implement clipping of bond lines using ConvexHull of atom characters
Detect if content control being added is ours (by examining it's tag) before trying to find it.
Fix Show As dropdown list of 1D labels, when a 1D structure selected.
Fix positioning of aromatic bond lines.
Update copyright to 2019
Fix inability to double click on structures to invoke editor.
Greater than 5 JavaScript errors in ChemDoodle Web 800 triggers refresh of deployed editor.
Better reporting of MOLFile and SDFile import errors.
Fix detection of Chemistry selection when switching documents.
Prevent Out of Memory Exception by limiting import from SDFile to first 16 structures.
Fix blank Uri exception when calling our Chemical Services.
Allow import of 1D chemical object (no atoms only labels)
Fix conversion of 1D chemical object (no atoms only labels)
Force ChemDoodle Web 7.0.2 if IE browser version is less than 10.
Fix memory leak in ChemDoodle Web 8.0.0 Editor.
Changed compatibility level to IE10 in ChemDoodle Web 8.0.0
Changes to UTC system time detection.
Allow structure with No atoms
Set Default editor to ChemDoodle Web 7.0.2 for new users if Windows 7 is detected
Fix horizontal scrolling of structure in Task Panes.
Handle error when WPF Browser does not load ChemDoodle Web.
New resolution independent ChemDoodle Web Editor (8.0.0).
Change method of opening files for import to improve handling of locked files.
Change to using our own InchiKey resolver, ChemSpider is no longer working.
Update SQLite to latest version.
Change to sending Telemetry via Azure ServiceBus.
Protect against accidental double clicking on Library and Navigator Buttons.
Add detection of conflict resolution mode.
Update SQLite to latest version.
Please download Chem4Word-Setup.exe from https://www.chem4word.co.uk/download/ if you encounter any difficulties updating.
Add button (under Help) to show why 'chemistry' ribbon buttons are all disabled.
Backup of document before conversion of legacy Content Controls.
Better positioning of charges when implicit hydrogens present.
Add support for legacy symbols for Elements 113 to 118.
Trap errors during close of document.
Fix Lazy Loading of Library Database.
Emergency Fix for Lazy Loading bug.
Change .Net Foundation url
Implement Lazy Loading of Options and LibraryNames, should help when two instances of Word strated at the same time.
Show any import Errors and/or Warnings on Import and in searcher forms.
Add telemetry to Copy/Paste operation.
Add detection of COMExceptions in language independant manner.
Added field for email address on Error Report form.
Now handles MDL MOLfile bond types of 4 to 8.
Return DialogResult.Cancel (to abort edit), after failed fetch of structure from ChemDoodle Web editor.
Ensure structure to be rendered has at least one atom.
Sign Chem4Word Updater
Ensure Library db is closed and disposed ASAP.
Fix wrong 1D tag inserted by convert to chemistry.
Allow Chemistry to be inserted from library when blank document opened.
Handle empty json from ChemDoodle Web.
Add Check for Updates after RightClick and Selection Change errors.
Fix Value out of range error during right click processing.
Fix get_ShapeRange error during selection processing.
Restrict Right Click chemistry detection to selections where there are up to 5 sentences, for performance reasons.
Prohibit chemistry when more than one cell of a table is selected.
Improved detection of places where chemistry is not allowed to be inserted (Microsoft Word does not allow it, not us!).
Handle old Word 2007 style Content Controls.
Improved Right Click detection of Chemistry.
Fix permissions issue with Library folder.

Run downloaded files from C:\Users\{InsertNameHere}\Downloads instead of C:\Users\{InsertNameHere}\AppData\Local\Temp. Host Intrustion Protection System (HIPS) preventing execution of files from temp folders.
Clearer message when initial setup is completed.
Handle documents in compatibility mode.
Handle error in setting text of 1D labels.
Make config files self healing, when options are added or removed.
Add option to Render Carbon Atoms.
Change updater to remove passive switch as this is failing to update.
Add extra menus to Help, to open manual, WebSite, YouTube and Manual Update Check.
Prevent structures with half bonds being sent to ChemSpider.
Handle error when TaskPane has already been closed.
Handle error when Ribbon is null.
Handle error when Library can't be copied.
Make Chem4WordSetup.exe single instance.
Allow Chem4Word-Versions.xml and updates to be deployed to multiple domains.
Ensure Chem4WordUpdater.exe copy was successful before trying to run it.
Revised Office version detection.
Fix glitch with detection of Office 365 (2016) installation.
If user chooses not to upgrade, prevent legacy chemistry being erased when saving a document.
Handle error caused if user tries to insert a V3000 molfile.
Fix some null pointer exceptions, caused by legacy (V2) data.
Add telemetry to ChemDoodle Web Editor to monitor start up time.
Fix ChEBI Search.
